The following short script is very rough. ``` from selenium import webdriver import os import urllib

chromedriver = “/path/to/your/selenium/chromedriver” os.environ[“webdriver.chrome.driver”] = chromedriver driver = webdriver.Chrome(chromedriver)

driver.get(‘https://www.google.co.jp/search?q=selenium&safe=off&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X’)

imgs = driver.find_elements_by_css_selector(‘img.rg_i’) n = 1 for i in imgs: src = i.get_attribute(‘src’) if src is None: continue urllib.urlretrieve(src, “capture_%d.jpg” % n) n+=1

driver.close()

```

- rendered with layout template -
